attributes.action: Sack or Prosecute all Health & Social Service workers connected with the "Baby P" case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am starting this petition as I feel very strongly about this case as I have a 17 month old boy. I find it disgraceful that only a few weeks ago two top BBC presenters were held accountable for say the slept with some ones granddaughter (which actually happened) and the outcry was unbelievable, yet when a small defenceless child is tortured then murdered those involved get a written warning.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
